attributes.action: acknowlege and respond to sensible and popular petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If a petition attracts support from thousands of people from all walks of life, the government should acknowledge that a large number of the electorate are concerned about the issue and expect a response or action.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
